description: Dropped Node 8 support. firebase-admin version 9.0.0 uses @google-cloud/firestore version 4.0.0 and @google-cloud/storage version 5.0.0, which has both dropped support for Node 8, hence if you are currently using node 8, and want to upgrade to firebase-admin version 9.0.0, you will also need at least Node 10.
